articles.title: The US Postal Service to Issue NASA Sun Science Forever Stamps - NASA
articles.description: In 2021, the US Postal Service is showcasing the Sun’s many faces with a series of Sun Science forever stamps that show images of solar activity captured by NASA’s Solar Dynamics Observatory, or SDO.
